text: deva granthaya denu læbuvanata numba sæma sadhakayakma gena hærapæva da ovuhu numbage kibla (disava) anugamanaya nokalaha. esema numba da ovunge kibla va anugamanaya karanneku nove. tavada ovungen samahareku samaharekuge kiblava anugamanaya karannan noveti. tavada numbata gnanaya pæmini pasuva numba ovunge mano asavan anugamanaya kalehi nam evita niyata vasayenma numba aparadhakaruvan aturin vannehiya
